channel.title: What Program should i use to edit .java?
channel.description:
Im currently using wordpad, but i cant copy codes into it withought it removing the spaces.
If I use Notepad i get my spaces but it dosnt seperate into indivigual lines. In wordpad it seperates but my spaces are gone.
What program should i use. (free please)
